ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: (OT) Easter Eggs again (Some spoilers!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: It doesn t seem to do anything. I ve given beggars money in both Freeport and Qeynos. Nothing.
ygData.messageBody:
It doesn't seem to do anything. I've given beggars money in both Freeport
and Qeynos. Nothing.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:llewis@...]
>Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 8:27 AM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: (OT) Easter Eggs again (Some spoilers!!!)
>
>
>From: Lonnie Lewis <llewis@...>
>
> It's "Could I have some copper?" The same thing said by the beggar
>in Freeport and HighKeep. I've never actually given them any
>copper though,
>maybe I should try. I think it'll just be the normal "Thank you". One of
>the few voice sounds in the game, it's pretty neat.
>
>Bien
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Jeremy Mueller [SMTP:jmueller@...]
>> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 11:29 AM
>> To: eqbards@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Re: (OT) Easter Eggs again (Some
>> spoilers!!!)
>>
>> From: "Jeremy Mueller" <jmueller@...>
>>
>> Just remembered this one....go to South Ro and sing Lullaby to a Desert
>> Madman. When he sleeps, he'll say something like "Could I have some
>> coffee?" (it's a sound) or very similar (in a very polite "Grey Poupon"
>> way :).
>>
>> --Khelan, Bard of the 19th song
>> GuildMaster of Divided Loyalties
>> Tarew Marr
>>
